sourcesContent:
import { Modal, Backdrop, Fade, Box, Typography, Grid } from "@mui/material"
import React from "react"
import ScoreModal from "./PointsModal"

const style = {
    position: 'absolute' as 'absolute',
    top: '50%',
    left: '50%',
    transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)',
    width: 400,
    bgcolor: 'background.paper',
    border: '2px solid #000',
    boxShadow: 24,
    p: 4,
}

function RulesModal({open, handleClose}: {open: boolean, handleClose: any}) {
    return (
        <Modal
            open={open}
            onClose={handleClose}
            aria-labelledby="modal-modal-title"
            aria-describedby="modal-modal-description"
            closeAfterTransition
            slots={{ backdrop: Backdrop }}
            slotProps={{
            backdrop: {
                timeout: 500,
            },
            }}
        >
            <Fade in={open}>
                <Box sx={style}>
                <Grid container justifyContent="center" spacing={5}>
                    <Grid item xs={12}>
                        <Typography variant="h3" align="center">RÃ¨gles du jeu Eleus-IA</Typography>
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={12}>
                        <Typography variant="h4">Game Rules:</Typography>
                        <Typography variant="body1" component="ol">
                        <Typography component="li">
                            Explore the maze and find the hidden treasure.
                        </Typography>
                        <Typography component="li">
                            Use arrow keys or WASD to move your character.
                        </Typography>
                        <Typography component="li">
                            Avoid traps and enemies that might block your way.
                        </Typography>
                        <Typography component="li">
                            Collect keys to unlock doors and advance further.
                        </Typography>
                        <Typography component="li">
                            Solve puzzles to uncover secret paths and shortcuts.
                        </Typography>
                        <Typography component="li">
                            Reach the treasure and complete the level to win.
                        </Typography>
                        </Typography>
                    </Grid>
                    </Grid>
                </Box>
            </Fade>
        </Modal>
    )
}

export default RulesModal
